Class PlacementController

java.lang.Object
com.example.battleship.controller.PlacementController
public class PlacementController extends Object
PlacementController class for managing the placement of ships on the player's board in the Battleship game. Handles drag-and-drop, rotation, and validation of ship positions, as well as navigation to the next game phase.
